snippet: Timbuktu, once an Islamic seat of learning and the site of many significant mausoleums, is occupied by a militant group that has vowed to level them.
abstract: Islamist militants, wielding pickaxes, begin destroying the mausoleums of Muslim saints in the northern city of Timbuktu; the militants from the group Ansar Dine, which controls much of northern Mali, adhere to a strict version of Islamic law and consider the shrines of the local Sufi version of Islam idolatrous.
lead_paragraph: Timbuktu, once an Islamic seat of learning and the site of many significant mausoleums, is occupied by a militant group that has vowed to level them.

headline.seo: Islamist Militants Destroying Shrines in Mali
headline.main: Militants Seek to Destroy Mali Shrines
headline.print_headline: Militants Seek To Destroy Mali Shrines

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
